meanings.definition: To express in terms of parameters.
meanings.sent1: I will parameterize the equation to make it easier to solve.
meanings.sent2: It is important to parameterize the data before conducting the analysis.
meanings.sent3: I tried to parameterize my feelings, but they were too complex to put into words.
meanings.sent4: She tried to parameterize her thoughts, but they kept changing like the weather.
meanings.sent5: By parameterizing the problem, we can break it down into manageable parts.

meanings.definition: To set or determine the parameters of something.
meanings.sent1: The technician will parameterize the machine for optimal performance.
meanings.sent2: Before starting the experiment, we need to parameterize the variables.
meanings.sent3: I jokingly asked my friend to parameterize the weather, but he just laughed.
meanings.sent4: She had to parameterize her schedule to fit in all the tasks.
meanings.sent5: Parameterizing the rules will help us stay organized and efficient.
